channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle -- Solaris Operating System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle -- Solaris Operating System

item.title: CVE-2016-8330|2024-08-06T02:20:30.789Z -- oracle -- solaris%20operating%20system
item.description: Vulnerability in the Solaris component of Oracle Sun Systems Products Suite (subcomponent: Kernel). The supported version that is affected is 11.3. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Solaris. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Solaris accessible data. CVSS v3.0 Base Score 3.7 (Integrity impacts).
